definitions.definition: An association of a carbohydrate and a phospholipid , such as phosphatidylinositol , found in cell membranes
A similar compound lacking a phosphate group

main_definition: ( biochemistry ) An association of a carbohydrate and a phospholipid , such as phosphatidylinositol , found in cell membranes
secondary_definitions: ( biochemistry ) A similar compound lacking a phosphate group
